argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_rehaus | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Haus |
| 2 |  | #P_uniretop | |- RR = U. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_sncld | |- ( ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Haus /\ A e. RR ) -> { A } e. ( Clsd ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_mpan | |- ( A e. RR -> { A } e. ( Clsd ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) ) |
